EmailTemplate.description: User Reactivation was successful and all licenses (if any) are restored.
EmailTemplate.name: User Reactivation Successful
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce User Reactivation Successful
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.FirstName},
Your salesforce user ID is successfully reactivated. User Name: {!User.Username} Please click on the link to access salesforce: Launch Salesforce
Some of the user licenses cannot be added to user profile due to technical limitation. Please create a VIA request.
Regards, Salesforce Platform Support
